/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with a variety of advertisements and billboards, adding a vibrant splash of color to the urban landscape. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the concrete jungle below. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, hinting at a touch of nature amidst the man-made structures.
